What an exhibition was this to be reported by the students to their distant friends and acquaintances! It was a witness that showed, not what God had accomplished in the school, but what Satan had accomplished. Serious is the consequence of even one such departure from the instruction that God has given concerning our schools. Once the barriers 
                                                                           46
are broken down, the advance of the enemy will be marked, unless the Lord shall humble hearts, and convert minds.
